name: Ext_R5_Procedure_occurrence
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Procedure.occurrence[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Procedure.occurrence[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Procedure|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: When the procedure occurred or is occurring
element.definition: Estimated or actual date, date-time, period, or age when the procedure did occur or is occurring.  Allows a period to support complex procedures that span more than one date, and also allows for the length of the procedure to be captured.
element.comment: `Procedure.performed[x]` maps to R4 `Procedure.performed[x]`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
